TopicTitle: what is the best way to intersept an asteroid befor it enters kerbin soi?

Articles.Content: I need to seen a probe to an asteroid and i need to have greater precision then you get in kerbins soi,so do enyone know about a good maneuver for this

Check out Scott Manleys Interstellar Quest Episode 62, where he does just that. Basically you align yourself to its projected orbit, then exit the SoI in the opposite direction of travel, then its just a matter of rendezvousing in deep space.
